29353.name: Tattoo of the Tukohama Warrior
stats: Melee Hits which Stun have 5% chance to Fortify
reminderText: (Fortifying grants an amount of Fortification based on the Damage of the Hit)
(Take 1% less Damage from Hits per Fortification. Maximum 20 Fortification. Fortification lasts 6 seconds)

items.name: Dragon Glimmer
enchantMods: 2 Added Passive Skills are Jewel Sockets
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Damage with Two Handed Weapons
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +2% to Cold Resistance
1 Added Passive Skill is Feed the Fury
1 Added Passive Skill is Martial Prowess
1 Added Passive Skill is Surefooted Striker
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Lethal Pride
explicitMods:
Commanded leadership over 10715 warriors under Kaom
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Karui
Historic
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: They believed themselves the greatest warriors, but that savagery turned upon their own.

items.name: Spirit Glimmer
enchantMods: 1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 15% increased Critical Strike Chance
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3 to All Attributes
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +2% to Fire Resistance
1 Added Passive Skill is Precise Retaliation
1 Added Passive Skill is Pressure Points
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Chimeric Flame
explicitMods: 17% increased Critical Strike Chance with Two Handed Melee Weapons
6% increased maximum Life
7% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Watcher's Eye
explicitMods: 5% increased maximum Energy Shield
5% increased maximum Life
5% increased maximum Mana
25% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks while using Pride
Impales you inflict last 2 additional Hits while using Pride
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: One by one, they stood their ground against a creature
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Forbidden Flesh
explicitMods: Allocates Masterful Form if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flame
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The bodies of those wholly subsumed by the Tangle
continue to merge and mutate and cry out for release...

items.name: Chimeric Vessel

+16% to Critical Strike Multiplier with Two Handed Melee Weapons
5% increased maximum Life
6% chance to Impale Enemies on Hit with Attacks
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Impossible Escape
explicitMods:
Passives in Radius of Iron Reflexes can be Allocated
without being connected to your tree
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: She was the last of countless progeny bred to test the limits of limitless power.
In the cosmic prison of her birth, her siblings fought each other to the death
for supremacy. She alone reached her limit... and broke through.

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: I just know that I know."
